ERROR_COLUMN_NOT_FOUND: Vodada: Kɔlam '{}' womekpɔe le DataFrame me o .
ERROR_INVALID_DATA: Vodada: Nyatakaka siwo mesɔ o siwo wona .
ERROR_MEDIA: Vodada ƒe akɔntabubu le mama dedie nu .
ERROR_MEDIANA: Vodada ƒe akɔntabubu le titina ŋu .
ERROR_DISPERSION: Vodada ƒe akɔntabubu kaka ƒe dzidzenuwo .
ERROR_COLUMNA_NO_EXISTE: kɔlam '{}' mele DataFrame la me o .
error_type: Ele be nusi wotsɔ de eme la nanye ka ƒomevi aɖe.
call:
Call(ŋkɔ, type=ɖeke meli o, mɔ=ɖeke meli o, ɣeyiɣi ƒe nuwuwu=5, strict=nyateƒe)
Edia faɛl to ŋkɔ (eye nàŋlɔe le mɔ si wodi nu) le agbalẽdzraɖoƒe aɖe si wona me (alo tso CWD me) gbugbɔna yia anyime eye emegbe wòyia dzi, .
eye wòtsɔa agba ɖe edzi le eƒe ƒomevi nu le eɖokui si.

Parameters:
    Ŋkɔ (str): Gɔmesese ƒe ŋkɔ na faɛl la, kpeɖeŋutɔ manɔmee.
    Ƒomevi (str, tiatia): Expected extension ('CSV', 'json', 'xml').
    Mɔ (str, tiatia): mɔ gbãtɔ si dzi woato adi tso.
    Timeout (int, optional): Didi ƒe ɣeyiɣi si sɔ gbɔ wu le sɛkɛndwo me.
    Sesẽ (Bool, Optional): Nenye nyateƒe la, doa vodada ɖe dzi ne wokpɔ faɛl geɖe siwo ƒe ŋkɔ sɔ.

Trɔna: Faɛl si ŋu woke ɖo alo ɖeke me nyawo o.
load_user_translations:
load_user_gɔmeɖeɖewo (lang_path="lang.json")
tsɔa gɔmeɖeɖe siwo zãla ɖe fia tso JSON faɛl me eye wòtsɔa wo tsakana kple gɔmeɖeɖe siwo woɖo ɖi.

Parameters:
    Lang_Path (str, tiatia): Mɔ si yi zãla ƒe gɔmeɖeɖewo ƒe faɛl la gbɔ. Defaults na "lang.json".

Nuwɔna:
    - Ne faɛl la li eye wòle json si sɔ la, ƒoa eƒe emenyawo nu ƒu kple gɔmeɖeɖe siwo woɖo ɖi .
    - Ne faɛl la meli o la, ke eƒe gɔmeɖeɖe siwo woɖo ɖi koe nɔa anyi .
    - Fia nuxlɔ̃ame popup ne faɛl la li gake womate ŋu atsɔe ade eme o .
    - Ewɔa Global _Translations nyagɔmeɖegbalẽa yeyee .

De dzesii: Ele be woayɔ dɔ sia hafi azã T() dɔwɔwɔ na zãla ƒe gɔmeɖeɖewo be woadze dɔwɔwɔ gɔme.
switch:
Enhanced switch-case system na Python. Kpekpeɖeŋuwo:
- Safui geɖe siwo sɔ kple wo nɔewo le nya ɖesiaɖe me .
- Tsɔ asixɔxɔ, ƒomevi, regex, lambda dɔwɔwɔ, alo klass .
- Pandas kple numpy data structure ƒe kpekpeɖeŋu .
- Optional async execution of cases .
- Match-all mode na nya geɖe siwo sɔ kple wo nɔewo wɔwɔ .
- Debug mode to log matching cases .
async_switch:
Wrapper to instantiate switch le async mode me. Parameters:
- Asixɔxɔ: Asixɔxɔ si sɔ kple nya siwo woɖe fia.
- **Kwargs: nya vevi siwo woate ŋu atia ƒe nyaʋiʋliwo yi na switch class la tẽ. Esiawo ate ŋu anye:
  - match_all (bool): Wɔ nusiwo katã sɔ kple wo nɔewo tsɔ wu be nàtɔ le gbãtɔa dzi.
  - Debug (Bool): Print which case sɔ kple nusi wowɔ.
  - async_mode (bool): Mele be woatsɔ asi ato afisia le afisia o (wozi edzi ɣesiaɣi be wòanye nyateƒe).
Kpɔɖeŋu: asyncswitch('hello', match_all=nyateƒe, debug=nyateƒe)(...)
encoding_error: Fail ƒe nuŋɔŋlɔ ƒe vodada (menye UTF-8 o) .
no_errors_found: Womekpɔ nyagɔmeɖegbalẽ ƒe vodada aɖeke o!
error_context: Nya siwo ƒo xlãe: {nya siwo ƒo xlãe}
provide_file_path: Taflatse mitsɔ faɛlmɔ aɖe si dzi miato akpɔ .
file_not_found_explicit: Faɛl '{Ŋkɔ}.{ext}' si womekpɔ le '{path}' me o.
file_not_found_any: Faɛl aɖeke si ŋkɔe nye '{name}' si wokpɔ le '{path}' me.
file_ambiguous: File geɖe siwo ŋkɔe nye '{name}' si wokpɔ: {ƒomeviwo}. Tsɔ ƒomevi alo zã strict=false.
unsupported_file_type: Faɛl ƒomevi si womedo alɔ o: {ext}
t: Trɔ nuŋɔŋlɔ si le teƒe ɖeka la na safui si wona si wotu ɖe gbe si nètia dzi.
show_gui_popup_description:
Fia fesre si aʋu si me nuŋɔŋlɔ me nyawo le kple nukpɔkpɔ le susu me.
Ekpɔa CLI kple Jupyter Notebook Environments siaa gbɔ.

Ŋutinuwo:
- Kɔpi/Dzra dɔwɔwɔ ƒe tɔtrɔwo ɖo ɖe active tab dzi .
- Nɔnɔmetatawo ŋudɔwɔwɔ nyuie le Jupyter me .
- Fesre ƒe nuwuwu dzadzɛ .

Args:
    Tanya (STR): Fesre ƒe Tanya .
    Emenyawo (STR): Nuŋɔŋlɔ me nyawo ɖeɖefia
    Fig (Matplotlib.Figure.Figure, tiatia): Nɔnɔmetata si wowɔ do ŋgɔ
    plot_function (si woate ŋu ayɔ, tiatia): dɔwɔwɔ si wɔa nɔnɔmetata .
    plot_args (Dict, tiatia): nyaʋiʋliwo na plot_function .
load_user_translations_error: Mete ŋu tsɔ agbatsɔla lang.json: {error} o.
semantic_analysis_failed: Gɔmesese me dzodzro do kpo nu: {MSG}
redundant_true: Redundant tsɔtsɔ sɔ kple nyateƒe, zã asixɔxɔa tẽ .
redundant_false: Redundant tsɔtsɔ sɔ kple alakpa, zã ‘menye’ boŋ .
none_comparison: Ele be tsɔtsɔ sɔ kple ame aɖeke nazã 'Is' ɖe '==' teƒe .
not_true_recommendation: Womekafui be woazã '!= true' o, bu nɔnɔmea wɔwɔ bɔbɔe ŋu .
not_false_recommendation: Womekafu '!= Aʋatso' zazã o, bu nɔnɔme nyui aɖe zazã ŋu kpɔ .
help_usage: Zã help('function_name') hena nyatakaka tsitotsito tso dɔ aɖe koŋ ŋu .
help_error: Vodada: Dɔwɔwɔ '{}' meli o alo nuŋlɔɖi aɖeke mele esi o .
async_preview_not_available:
Async ƒe kpɔɖeŋu mateŋu adze le sync preview me o.
Zã 'Lawait asyncswitch(...)' le async nɔnɔme me.
scatter_description: Ewɔa kaka ƒe nɔnɔmetata be woatsɔ akpɔ ƒomedodo si le tɔtrɔ eve siwo yia edzi dome le susu me.
lineplot_description: Ewɔa fli ƒe nɔnɔmetata si sɔ nyuie na ɣeyiɣi ƒe ɖoɖo alo ɖoɖowɔɖi ƒe nyatakaka siwo woɖo ɖe ɖoɖo nu.
kdeplot_description: Ewɔa histogram si wowɔ nyuie to kernel density estimation zazã me.
violinplot_description: ɖe agbɔsɔsɔme ŋuti nyatakakawo ƒe mama fia le hatsotso geɖe me.
pairplot_description: Ewɔa ƒomedodo eve eve le nyatakakadzraɖoƒe si ɖea ƒunukpeƒewo kple mamawo siaa fiana.
countplot_description: A bar plot si ɖea categorical data ƒe dzidziɖedzi fiana.
lmplot_description: Plots data kple linear regression model si sɔ kple kakaɖedzi ƒe dometsotsowo.
jointplot_description: Tsɔ kaka ƒe nɔnɔmetata kple histogramwo alo KDE plots ƒo ƒu ɖe goawo dzi.
swarmplot_description: ɖe nusiwo katã wokpɔ la fia tsɔ kpe ɖe mama si le ete ƒe nɔnɔmetatawo ŋu.
regplot_description: Plots data kple regression model si sɔ kple polynomial ɖoɖo si woate ŋu atia.
barplot_description: ɖe teƒe ƒe akɔntabubuwo kple kakaɖedzi ƒe dometsotsowo fia abe dzogoe ene me ʋuƒo ene.
stripplot_description: A scatter plot si me tɔtrɔɖenu ɖeka nye categorical kple jitter be woaƒo asa na overlap.
large_plot_note: MIDE DZESII: Nya sia ate ŋu axɔ ɣeyiɣi kpui aɖe hafi wòaɖe egɔme le eƒe lolome ta .
preview_not_available: Interactive Preview mele dɔ sia wɔwɔ me o .
get_moda_description: Bu akɔnta le nyatakakadzraɖoƒe ƒe nɔnɔme (si ƒe asixɔxɔ bɔ wu) ŋu. Ate ŋu atrɔ asixɔxɔa kple eƒe frequency count.
get_media_description: Bu akɔnta le akɔntabubu ƒe akɔntabubu ƒe mama dedie (mamã dedie) ŋu. Ekpɔa NAN ƒe asixɔxɔwo dzi le wo ɖokui si.
get_median_description: Bu akɔnta le nyatakakadzraɖoƒe ƒe titina (titina ƒe asixɔxɔ) ŋu. Ekpɔa NAN ƒe asixɔxɔwo dzi le wo ɖokui si.
get_rank_description: Bu akɔnta le range (vovototo le max kple min dome) le dataframe column me.
get_var_description: Bu akɔnta le vovototo si le dataframe column me ŋu.
get_desv_description: Bu akɔnta le DataFrame ƒe kɔlam ƒe vovototo si woɖo ɖi ŋu.
disp_description: Trɔ kaka ƒe dzidzenuwo (ƒe didime, vovototo, standard deviation) na dataframe column.
call_description: Di faɛl siwo le nɔnɔme vovovowo me (CSV, JSON, XML) eye wòxlẽa wo kple didi ƒe tiatia siwo te ŋu trɔna bɔbɔe.
check_syntax_description: Kua Python code me hena nyagɔmeɖegbalẽ ƒe vodadawo, ŋkɔ siwo womeɖe o, kple atsyã ƒe nyawo.
createDB_description: Dɔwɔƒe ƒe dɔwɔwɔ be woawɔ nyatakakadzraɖoƒe ƒe kadodo ƒe kpɔɖeŋu.
exportData_description: Eɖoa nyatakakawo tso nyatakakadzraɖoƒe ƒe kplɔ̃wo dzi yia nɔnɔme vovovowo me (CSV, JSON, XML, SQL, Excel, kple bubuawo).
addTable_description: Tsɔ kplɔ̃ yeye kpe ɖe nyatakakadzraɖoƒea ŋu kple sɔti kple mɔxenu siwo woɖo ɖi.
mergeTable_description: ƒoa kplɔ̃ geɖewo nu ƒu to SQL logic zazã me kple join ƒomevi vovovowo.
join_description: Ewɔa SQL joins le kplɔ̃wo dome kple join ƒomevi vovovowo.
drop_description: Wotsɔa kplɔ̃wo ƒua gbe tso nyatakakadzraɖoƒea, ne èdi la, kple Cascade.
cascadeDelete_description: Ewɔa cascade deletion le nɔnɔme aɖe nu, si kpɔa nusiwo dzi woanɔ te ɖo dzi.
recursiveQuery_description: Ewɔa biabia siwo wogbugbɔ gblɔna la to kplɔ̃ dzi nyagbɔgblɔ siwo bɔ (CTE) zazã me.
windowFunction_description: Ewɔa fesre ƒe dɔwɔwɔwo (ROW_NUMBER, Rank, kple bubuawo) ŋudɔ ɖe kplɔ̃ dzi nyatakakawo ŋu.
executeRawSQL_description: Ewɔa SQL biabia xoxowo tẽ le nyatakakadzraɖoƒea.
show_description: Fia nyatakakadzraɖoƒe ƒe kplɔ̃wo kple nyatakakawo le nɔnɔmetata ƒe ŋgɔdonya me.
hbar_description: Ewɔa bar chart si le tsia dzi si me woŋlɔa dzesideŋkɔwo kple amadede siwo woate ŋu atrɔ asi le.
vbar_description: Ewɔa bar chart si le tsitrenu si dzi woŋlɔa dzesideŋkɔwo kple amadede siwo woate ŋu atrɔ asi le.
pie_description: Ewɔa pie chart si me woŋlɔa dzesideŋkɔwo, amadedewo, kple alafa memamã ƒe ɖoɖo si woate ŋu atrɔ asi le.
boxplot_description: Ewɔa aɖaka ƒe nɔnɔmetata be woatsɔ akpɔ nyatakakawo ƒe mama le susu me le hatsotsowo me.
histo_description: Ewɔa histogram be woatsɔ akpɔ xexlẽdzesi ƒe tɔtrɔ ƒe mama le susu me.
heatmap_description: Ewɔa dzoxɔxɔ ƒe nɔnɔmetata be woatsɔ akpɔ nyatakaka siwo le abe matriki ene le susu me kple amadede ƒe nuŋɔŋlɔ.
table_description: Ewɔa kplɔ̃ ƒe nɔnɔmetata tso nyatakakawo ƒe ƒuƒoƒo alo nyatakakawo ƒe ƒuƒoƒo me.
normalize_description: Ewɔa ɖoɖo ɖe ƒuƒoƒo si le 0 kple 1 dome ŋu nyuie to min-max scaling zazã me.
conditional_description: Ewɔa nɔnɔme siwo me susu le ŋudɔ tsɔ wɔa kɔlam yeye aɖe le DataFrame me.
convert_file_description: Etrɔa faɛlwo le nɔnɔme vovovowo (SHP, DBF, XML, kple bubuawo) me ɖe CSV me.
Switch_description: Synchronous switch ƒe dɔwɔwɔ kple kpɔɖeŋu ƒe sɔsɔme ƒe nɔnɔme geɖewo.
switch_description: Wrapper dɔwɔwɔ na dzɔdzɔme syntax zazã le synchronous switch.
AsyncSwitch_description: Asynchronous switch dɔwɔwɔ kple kpɔɖeŋu ƒe sɔsɔme ƒe nɔnɔme geɖewo.
async_switch_description: Wrapper dɔwɔwɔ na dzɔdzɔme syntax zazã le asynchronous switch.
config_description: Xexeame katã ƒe ɖoɖowɔɖi ƒe nyagɔmeɖegbalẽ na module ƒe ɖoɖowo.
fig_to_img_description: Etrɔa matplotlib ƒe nɔnɔmetata wòzua nɔnɔmetata ƒe ƒuƒoƒo hena zazã le nukpɔkpɔ bubuwo me.
format_number_description: Formats xexlẽdzesiwo kple customizable decimal teƒewo kple alafa memamã ƒe nɔnɔme.
load_user_translations_description: Edaa gbegɔmeɖeɖe ƒe faɛl siwo zãla ɖe fia be woakeke gɔmeɖeɖe siwo woɖo ɖi la ɖe enu alo ɖe wo ɖa.
register_description: Decorator be woaŋlɔ dɔwɔwɔwo alo klasswo ɖe xexeame katã ƒe ŋkɔ ŋɔŋlɔ me.
set_language_description: Ðo gbe si wodona fifia na gbegɔmeɖeɖewo.
t_description: Gbegɔmeɖeɖedɔ si trɔa ka si gɔme woɖe la na safui aɖe si wona le gbe si li fifia me.
